cab.content: S e g H e i.n m 9 R^.WAH CABINET.war Office,Whitehall, S.W.23rd March, 1917.Secretary,War Cabinet.Herewith ten copies of a telegram No. T.L.850 dated20th instant from Colonel Wavell, regarding the command of theHussian Armies, for circulation to the War Cabinet please.(Signed) P. MAURICE.D.M.O.QPEPATIOiJS.From;- Col.Wavell.To:- C.I.G.S. 20/3/17.T.L.850.The Grand Puke left here (1 group undecipherable) for Stavka, accompanied by General Yanushkevitch. Last night General Yudenitch returned from Erzerum and will act as Commander-in-Chief of Caucasus.Following is very secret. The staff is a little anxious as to the attitude of the rank and file but there no signs of any probability of trouble at present.
